'''''"Luachra the Brilliant"''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must defeat the [[Local Legend]] {{Enemy|Cherubic Sea Hare|text=Luachra the Brilliant &mdash; Guardian of "Paradise."}}

==Gameplay Notes==
* Luachra the Brilliant can be found underwater in the northwestern section of [[Liffey Region]], by the [[Le Scaphandre et le Pufferfruit|Pufferfruit training mechanism]].
